passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks heal this unit for 100% of total damage dealt.

Whenever another unit on the battlefield damages any unit(s) with an attack, this unit's current TU is reduced by 10TU per unit hit.

Each time an enemy unit gets the turn, if this unit has 150TU or more, this unit will gain the Counter Stance status effect for 150TU at the end of that turn.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Steel Resolve
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated, it instead survives with 1 HP and then cannot be defeated until its next turn. This effect can trigger only once each time this unit enters the battlefield, and is considered a Hold Ground+ effect.

This unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield.

Each time a unit gets the turn while their team has 5+ Spirit, this unit will be healed for 30% of its max HP.

Whenever this unit defeats a non-conjured unit on the battlefield with an attack:
- All allies will be healed for 100% of their max HP.
- All allies will have Burn status effects (including Mega Healing Burn) removed.

This skill can only be used once each time this unit is on the battlefield, and only if there is no other non-Mori Guardian on the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Unsinkable Guard
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit is a Guardian. For any enemy attack that would hit 1 or 2 other allies, this unit has a 100% chance to redirect 1 hit to itself instead. This unit will not redirect skills that don't deal damage.

Whenever this unit or another non-Guardian ally takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn and this unit has any other allies left (even in reinforcements), this unit will:
- Heal for 25% of max HP.
- Gain a Charge.

Whenever this unit would gain a charge while already having 3 Charges, an Imposter is added to the next in line of enemy reinforcements, and a random enemy is granted the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. This will overwrite other status effects on that unit. Then all Charges are removed from this unit, and it cannot gain any more charges until the following turn. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Anchors Away
passiveSkillDetails.description:
When this unit enters the battlefield from the allied reinforcements and there are no other non-Mori ally Guardians on the battlefield, all allies:
- Are healed for 1000% of this unit's attack.
- Have their current TU reduced by 50TU.
- Gain the Armor status effect. This will overwrite other status effects on those units. Armor grants 50% damage reduction from the next attack, then the effect is removed.

This unit has 10% damage reduction from attacks, plus 10% per Awakening (up to 50% reduction if this unit has 4 Awakenings) until the end of its first turn since entering the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Paint Fall
activeSkillDetails.description:
50% damage to all enemies. This attack ignores damage reduction effects, skin passive skills, the Stealth Status Effect, and the Counter Stance Status Effect. Randomly grants all allies either Stun Wards, or Sleep Wards. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

Then heals all allies for 200% of the user's attack. This triggers once for each Element type that remains on the battlefield.

Unlocked each time the user damages an enemy with another attack. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Stroke of Genius
activeSkillDetails.description: Damage 1 enemy. This attack ignores any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. 300% damage instead if the user or target have defeated 1 unit with an attack while on the battlefiled. 400% damage instead if the user or target have defeated 2+ units with attacks while on the battlefield.

activeSkillDetails.name: Masterpiece
activeSkillDetails.description:
Immediately defeats 1 non-boss enemy, the user is considered to have defeated the target with an attack if successful. This effect ignores Revenge passive skills, Revival passive skills, any passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, and cannot be redirected by Guardians.

Locked for 300TU after the user has entered the battlefield. This lock is ignored while all 6 Element types are on the battlefield. Usable twice per battle.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Elemental Palette
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit enters battle with a Stun Ward, and Sleep Ward. This unit cannot be defeated by damage from Poison or Burn status effects.

When attacking, adds 100% to the damage % of this unit's attacks for each Element type on the battlefield. (e.g. Paint Fall: 50% => 350% damage when 3 Element types are on the battlefield)

When this unit damages an enemy with an attack, if they are:
- Water or Dark, Stun them for 100TU.
- Fire or Light, grant them the Sleep status effect for 100TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. Sleep will overwrite other status effects on those units.
- Storm or Earth, grant them the Mega Poison status effect for 100TU. Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on those units. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Legendary Artist
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP. This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks. This unit has 80% damage reduction from attacks instead if all 6 Element types are on the battlefield.

Each time an ally (including this unit) gets the turn, this unit will be healed for 25% of its max HP. Then this unit will have Sleep status effects removed at the end of the turn.

Whenever another ally gets the turn, if there is a different ally (including Hokusai) that matches their Element on the battlefield, the acting ally will be healed for 25% of their max HP. Then allies gain 1 Spirit at the end of that turn.

When this unit enters the battlefield all allies are granted Elemental Quicken. Units with Elemental Quicken will have their TU costs for all of their skills reduced by 20% while there is a different ally with a matching Element on the battlefield. Whenever another ally enters the battlefield from reinforcements, they are also granted Elemental Quicken. Elemental Quicken will overwrite the effect of previous Quicken skills.

Whenever a non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, this unit loses 1 Charge.

Then if 4 allies were already on the battlefield, the user sends themself to the back of allied reinforcements.

passiveSkillDetails.name: G.sword Resist Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% less damage from attacks by units equipped with Greatswords.

leaderSkill.name: Fire Attack Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Fire element units have their Attack increased by 15%.

activeSkills.name: Flame Sweep
activeSkills.description: 100% damage to all enemies, 250% damage instead if the user is burning, or to targets that are burning. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect, the effects of Skin passive skills, and heals the user for 100% of total damage dealt. This is not considered a Burn Blast type skill.

activeSkills.name: Binding Flames
activeSkills.description: Burns 1 Enemy, then Stuns them randomly for either 50TU or 200TU if they are Burning. That target is granted a Stun Hex, which will stun all enemies for 100TU at the end of that targets next turn, then be removed. Allies gain 2 Spirit. This skill has no effect if it targets a Water enemy, and is usable only if there is no Stun Hex among enemies. Stun Hexes cannot be purified, and will be removed if the hexed unit is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with burn will also become burned.

activeSkills.name: Death Blow
activeSkills.description:
750% damage to 1 enemy. The user gains the Mega Healing Burn status effect for 100TU if the user is not burning. This attack ignores effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. Usable only if all enemies on the battlefield are burning or if the user is not burning.

A unit with Mega Healing Burn will heal after each turn at 20 times the rate as Healing Burn. This will overwrite other status effects on the user, cannot be overwritten by Burn, Poison or Sleep status effects, and cannot be Purified. Any unit that deals damage to or is dealt damage by a unit with Mega Healing Burn will gain the Burn status effect. A unit with Mega Healing Burn will be granted Healing Burn for 300TU when Mega Healing Burn expires.

activeSkills.name: Hell's Judgement
activeSkills.description:
500% damage to 2 enemies, and the user will also Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP. Endure effects cannot stack. This attack ignores damage reduction effects.

At the end of the turn, allies that are either Fire element or have Burn Blast or Burn Drive type active skills will gain the Burn status effect, and all other allies will have Burn removed. Unlocked each time a non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Hellish Wildfire
passiveSkillDetails.description:
At the end of each turn, this unit grants a random non-burning, non-water ally on the battlefield the burn status effect. Then a random burning ally will heal for 30% of their max HP.

At the end of each other ally turn, if all ally units are burning, this unit will immediately get the next turn by having its TU reduced to 0, then this effect cannot trigger again until 20TU advances.

All Fire Allies and Allies with Burn Blast and Burn Drive type active skills are Quickened by 30% when this unit enters the battlefield, or when those allies enter from reinforcements while this unit is on the battlefield. This will overwrite the effects of other Quicken skills on affected units.

passiveSkillDetails.name: HP Up Lv3
passiveSkillDetails.description: Adds 1200 to this unit's max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.description: 10% less damage from attacks by Fire units.

leaderSkill.name: Dark Attack Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Dark element units have their Attack increased by 15%.

activeSkills.name: Toxic Shot
activeSkills.description:
50% damage to 1 enemy. 500% damage instead if the user's HP is at 75%+. Grants the target the Super Poison status effect. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect, the effects of Skin passive skills, and steals up to 3 Spirit from enemies.

Super Poison will overwrite other status effects on those enemies. Super Poison deals 4 times the damage of normal poison, and cannot be overwritten by normal poison.

activeSkills.name: Time Desecrator
activeSkills.description:
100% damage to 1 enemy. If the target has 50+ TU, deals 400% damage instead and grants the Mega Poison status effect for 200TU. 600% damage instead with Mega Poison if the target has 100+ TU. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects. The user is granted Poison and Burn wards.

Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack. Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on that enemy. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

activeSkills.name: Unleash Hell
activeSkills.description:
300% damage to all enemies. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect and the effects of Skin passive skills. 450% damage if the user has defeated 1 unit with an attack while on the battlefield, 600% if the user has defeated 2+ units. Grants all Mega Poisoned enemies Lethal Poison for 999TU. Then, grants all Super Poisoned enemies Mega Poison for 200TU. Then grants Super Poison to all other enemies that were hit.

Lethal Poison will overwrite other status effects, cannot be overwritten by status effects other than Burn or Stealth, and cannot be Purified. Lethal Poison deals 2 times the damage of normal Poison and ignores passive skills or effects of active skills that would prevent the target from being defeated, other than those which specifically prevent defeat from Poison or non-attack damage. Lethal Poison cannot apply to Burning units or Boss units.

activeSkills.description: Stuns 2 enemies for 100TU and grants them the Mega Poison status effect for 200TU. This skill can be redirected by enemy Stun Absorbers. This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Steady Aim
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit cannot fall asleep if there are any Water enemies on the battlefield. Each time a poisoned enemy gets the turn, this unit heals for 20% of its max HP.

If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

If this unit damages at least one enemy with 100+TU with an attack, this unit will get another turn. Damaged targets cannot trigger this effect again until TU advances. Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the extra turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

passiveSkillDetails.name: Awakened Blade
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

This unit heals for 10% of max HP, each time an ally hits an enemy with an attack.

Whenever an ally Mori enters the battlefield from reinforcements, this unit heals 10% of max HP.

Whenever a non-sleeping ally gets the turn, this unit will gain Stealth and a Stealth Shield at the end of that turn. Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.

activeSkills.name: First Blood
activeSkills.description: 200% damage to 1 enemy. 500% damage instead if the user has not yet defeated an enemy with an attack while on the battlefield. Heals the user for 30% of max HP. If an enemy is sleeping, grants the target the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects and does not wake up sleeping enemies.

activeSkills.name: Disabling Pulse
activeSkills.description:
Grants 1 enemy the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield. This will overwrite other status effects on that unit.

Then if that target is not asleep (e.g. due to a Sleep Ward), exchanges them with an Imposter. The exchanged enemy will be sent to a random place in line of enemy reinforcements. This exchange will fail if the target is Immovable or if there are less than 4 enemies on the battlefield (no imposter will be added). This skill becomes locked after use until the user uses another active skill.

activeSkills.name: Royal Fortissimo
activeSkills.description: 600% damage to 2 enemies if they are sleeping, this damage will not wake up sleeping enemies. This attack ignores damage reduction effects. The user recovers HP to 100% of its own max if damage is dealt to a sleeping target. If damage is dealt to 2 sleeping targets, the user will immediately get the next turn by having its TU reduced to 0, and this skill will become locked until the user damages an enemy with another attack.

activeSkills.name: Royal Grandioso
activeSkills.description: 600% damage to 1 enemy. This attack ignores any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. Damage from this attack does not wake up sleeping enemies. This skill is usable if all enemies are sleeping or if the user has survived 200TU on the battlefield. This skill becomes locked for 75TU after use.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Symphony of Vigor
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit cannot be defeated by damage from Poison or Burn status effects. If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP. While this unit has 50% or more of max HP, it has 65% damage reduction from attacks.

Each time a sleeping enemy gets the turn, all allies heal for 30% of max HP.

Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn with more than 1 HP, this unit becomes Enraged, and will Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1 HP, Endure effects cannot stack. This will overwrite the effects of other Enrage skills on this unit. Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn.

leaderSkill.name: Light HP Up
leaderSkill.description: Allied Light element units have their max HP increased by 10%.

activeSkills.name: Divine Strike
activeSkills.description:
75% Damage to 1 enemy. Damage doubles for each charge the user has stored (600% max). Then the user is granted 1 charge and the Counter Stance status effect for 300TU.

Counter Stance will overwrite other status effects on the user. For 300TU, the next time the unit with counter stance takes damage from an enemy attack, it will become their turn. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: Combo Drive
activeSkills.description:
600% damage to 2 enemies. Heals all allies for 500% of the user's attack if damage is dealt. All enemies hit by this attack will become Weakened, this will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on those units. This attack ignores damage reduction effects. Unlocked each time the user damages an enemy with another attack. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

Weakened units have their Attack reduced to 0.75x until the end of their next turn. The effect of Weakening may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects and it can be overwritten by Enrage effects.

activeSkills.name: Light's Embrace
activeSkills.description: Immediately give all other allies that are below 50% of max HP the next turns by reducing their current TU. Active skills that grant turns cannot be used by any affected units until after they have had the turn. Then heals those allies for 100% of their max HP, and Purifies them (removes negative status effects like Sleep, Burn or Poison). The user is granted 1 charge for each affected ally. Usable if at least 1 other ally on the battlefield has less than 50% of max HP and if the user has no ally Guardian on the battlefield.

activeSkills.name: Divine Purification
activeSkills.description: Removes negative status effects like Sleep, Burn or Poison from 1 ally. Then grants them a Purify Chain if there is no Purify Chain among allies. A unit with a Purify Chain will Purify another random ally after their turn, then they will pass the Purify Chain to that ally. Purify Chains will end only if the unit with the Purify Chain is defeated, leaves the battlefield, or falls asleep. This skill becomes locked for 10TU after use.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Barrier of Light
passiveSkillDetails.description:
When this unit enters the battlefield and at the end of each turn, if there is no ally Guardian on the battlefield, this unit will become a Stun Absorber (Whenever any ally would be affected by stun, this unit takes the stun instead). At end of each turn, if there is an ally Guardian on the battlefield, this unit will stop being a Stun Absorber.

This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks, and is not affected by damage reduction effects granted by ally Barrier type skills.

Grants all other allies 35% damage reduction from attacks while this unit is on the battlefield and there is no Guardian among allies. This effect does not stack with itself if another ally has this passive skill, or with other Barrier type skills.

Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, Weaken all enemies. If this unit survives until after the end of the turn with more than 1 HP, this unit will gain 1 Charge and heal 30% of max HP.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Divine Intervention
passiveSkillDetails.description:
If an acting enemy unit has had the turn 2 or more times already within the last 10TU, they are granted the Sleep status effect for 50TU at the end of their turn, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield.

Whenever a non-conjured unit on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source, this unit will gain the Counter Stance status effect for 300TU.

This unit enters battle with 1 Charge. If this unit would be defeated while it has any charges, this unit will consume 1 charge to survive with 1HP remaining instead.

passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit cannot be defeated by damage from Burn status effects. This unit is not affected by stun effects. This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks if this unit is not burning or sleeping.

If this unit is burning, this unit has:
- Hold Ground (if this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP)
- 100% chance to ignore attacks that would damage exactly 2 targets. Attacks that target All allies will not be ignored.
- TU costs for all active skills reduced by 40%. This effect does not stack with Quicken skills.

activeSkills.name: Trinity Thrust
activeSkills.description:
75% damage to 1 enemy. 500% damage instead if the user has stealth. Then the user is granted Stealth, and a Stealth Shield.

Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.

activeSkills.name: Stealth Landslide
activeSkills.description: Targets 2 enemies. 500% damage to targets that are not burning. Usable only if the user has the Stealth status effect. This attack ignores any enemy status effects (including Stealth), damage reduction effects, revenge passive skills, and skin passive skills. This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use.

activeSkills.name: Boundless Slash
activeSkills.description:
500% damage to 1 enemy, and the user is granted Stealth, a Stealth Shield, and 3 Charges. This attack ignores damage reduction effects.

The next damage the user deals with an Attack while on the battlefield will ignore any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated. Usable only if the user has no Charges stored.

activeSkills.name: Trinity Onslaught
activeSkills.description:
Damage 2 enemies, and then grants those enemies the Mega Poison status effect for 200TU if they are left with below 25% of max HP. 300% damage to targets that have survived 100TU or more, and are not burning. 600% damage to targets that have survived 200TU or more, and are not burning. This attack ignores damage reduction effects.

Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on affected enemies. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Captain's Resolve
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Unless this unit is burning, this unit is immune to Stun effects. Poison cannot be applied to this unit while it has the Stealth status effect. Until this unit has survived for 1000TU on the battlefield, this unit gains Stealth and a Stealth Shield every 100TU.

This unit's attacks heal this unit for 100% of total damage dealt. This unit enters battle with Stealth, a Stealth Shield, and 3 Charges. If this unit would be defeated while it has any charges, this unit will consume 1 charge to survive with 1HP remaining instead. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Vengeance Rampage
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Whenever this unit defeats a non-conjured unit on the battlefield with an attack, the next damage this unit deals with an Attack while on the battlefield will ignore any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the target from being defeated.

Allies gain the Stealth status effect, a Stealth Shield, 2 Spirit and will become Enraged. All of these effects are triggered whenever another non-conjured Ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. This may not trigger if this unit is defeated or sacrificed at the same time. This will overwrite other status effects and the effects of other Enrage skills on those units. Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn.

passiveSkillDetails.description:
Poison cannot be applied to this unit while it has the Stealth status effect.

This unit will immediately get the next turn by having its TU reduced to 0. Triggered when this unit enters the battlefield from reinforcements unless there is a non-Mori Guardian among allies on the battlefield.

Unless there is a non-Mori Guardian among allies on the battlefield, this unit has:
- Attack increased to 1.5x. This effect does not stack with Enrage skills.
- TU costs for all active skills reduced by 40%. This effect does not stack with Quicken skills.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Demonic Resolve
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Each time this unit takes damage from an attack while its TU is 100 or less and survives until after the end of the turn with more than 1 HP, this unit will immediately get the turn by having its TU reduced to 0. Then this unit will heal for 30% of max HP, and gain Stealth, even if it survived with 1HP. This extra turn may be interrupted by other effects that influence the turn order (e.g. stuns targeting the lowest TU target). This is not considered a Counter Skin type effect.

This unit enters battle with 3 Charges. If this unit would be defeated while it has any charges, this unit will consume 1 charge to survive with 1HP remaining instead. Whenever a Stealthed ally gets the turn, this unit gains 1 charge at the end of the turn. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

Allies gain 1 Spirit for each Poisoned or Sleeping enemy on the battlefield. Then each non-burning enemy is randomly granted either Mega Poison for 200TU or Cursed Sleep for 200TU.

Unlocked each time a non-conjured enemy on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield. Cursed Sleep will overwrite status effects other than Burn, cannot be overwritten by Poison, can be applied repeatedly to units that have already slept while on the battlefield, and will not end from damage caused by Dream Hunter type active skills.

This unit enters battle with a Poison Ward, Sleep Ward, Stealth, and Stealth Shield. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

- this unit steals up to 1 Spirit from the enemy team at the end of the turn.

If this unit is on 1HP at the end of a turn, it is healed for 100% max HP and Purified (negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed) at the end of the turn.

This unit gains 3 charges. Triggered both at the very start of the battle if this unit is on the battlefield, and when this unit enters the battlefield from reinforcements.

If this unit would be defeated while it has any charges, this unit will consume 1 charge to survive with 1HP remaining instead. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store up to 3 charges.

passiveSkillDetails.name: The Great Old One
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Whenever an enemy enters the battlefield from reinforcements, this unit has a 20% chance, plus 20% chance per Awakening (up to 100% chance if this unit has 4 Awakenings) to immediately have its TU reduced to 0, be Purified, and be granted Sleep Immunity until the end of the turn.

The first time this unit is damaged by an attack while this unit has no Charges, it will survive that attack and then enter Warped Reality for 200TU. While in Warped Reality, this unit cannot be sent to the reinforcements from the battlefield, cannot be defeated by damage, has 90% damage reduction from attacks and is a Guardian.

Whenever this unit gets the turn in Warped Reality, it will lose the turn and Mega Poison all non-sleeping enemies for 200TU. Then if there is more than 1 enemy on the battlefield and no enemy is Hypnotized, this unit will hypnotize 1 random enemy on the battlefield. This unit cannot be Hypnotized while in Warped Reality. When Warped Reality ends, this unit will be sacrificed.

While this unit is a Guardian, for any enemy attack that would hit 1 or 2 other allies, this unit has a 100% chance to redirect 1 hit to itself instead. This unit will not redirect skills that don't deal damage. A Hypnotized enemy will use its next turn to grant the turn to and Purify the hypnotizer (the turn will be lost as if it were sleeping), and then the hypnosis will end. Hypnosis is not a status effect and cannot be removed by Purify skills, but will be canceled if the hypnotizer is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Hypnosis will fail against Boss units.

600% damage to 2 enemies. This attack ignores any effects of non-boss enemies that would prevent the targets from being defeated.

Locked for 300TU after the user has entered the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Chevalier's Grace
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit has 50% damage reduction from attacks. If this unit would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

When this unit gets the turn with less than 50% HP, this unit exchanges its current HP with the amount of HP it has currently lost.

Grants all other allies the Armor status effect, and all Enemies 3 Discharge Counters. Triggered both at the very start of the battle if this unit is on the battlefield, and when this unit enters the battlefield from reinforcements. New enemies entering the battlefield will be granted 3 Discharge Counters.

Armor will overwrite other status effects on those allies. Armor grants 50% damage reduction from the next attack, then the effect is removed. A unit can store a maximum of 3 Discharge Counters, and all are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Electrostatic Field
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Enemies entering the battlefield have a 20% chance to be immediately stunned for 50TU, plus 20% chance per Awakening (up to 100% chance if this unit has 4 Awakenings).

Whenever another ally enters the battlefield from reinforcements, they are granted the Armor status effect.

This unit is granted a Sleep ward. Triggered at the very start of the battle if this unit is on the battlefield, and whenever any unit (including this unit) enters the battlefield from reinforcements.

activeSkills.name: Stealth Blast
activeSkills.description:
50% damage to 1 enemy. 300% damage instead every second time this skill is activated while on the battlefield. The user is granted Stealth, and a Stealth Shield. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect, and the effects of Skin passive skills.

Stealth will overwrite other Status effects on the user. Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.

activeSkills.name: Waves of Sleep
activeSkills.description: Grants 2 enemies the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield, and the user is granted Stealth, and a Stealth Shield. This will overwrite other status effects on those units. Unlocked each time the user damages an enemy with an attack. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield. This is not considered a Combo Burst type active skill.

activeSkills.name: Knockout Storm
activeSkills.description:
500% damage to 1 enemy, and then grants that enemy the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even if they have already slept while on the battlefield if they are left with below 50% of max HP. This attack ignores damage reduction effects. Sleep will overwrite other status effects on that enemy.

This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use. Usable if the user has the Stealth status effect or at the cost of consuming 1 charge if the user has no stealth. This is considered a Stealth Strike type skill.

activeSkills.name: Unending Nightmare
activeSkills.description: Targets 1 enemy. If the target is sleeping, deals 600% damage, grants them the Sleep status effect for 200TU, even though they have already slept while on the battlefield, and allies gain 4 Spirit.

This unit cannot be burned.

This unit enters battle with Stealth, a Stealth Shield, and 3 Charges. Certain skills are affected by and may consume charges. A unit can store a maximum of 3 charges, and all charges are removed from a unit that leaves the battlefield.

Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will heal for 25% of its max HP. If this unit would be defeated while it has any charges, this unit will consume 1 charge to survive with 1HP remaining instead. Whenever a sleeping enemy gets the turn or this unit damages a sleeping enemy with an attack, this unit gains 1 charge.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Water Slaughter
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks will not wake sleeping enemies.

Each time this unit damages a sleeping enemy with an attack, this unit will get another turn. This effect cannot trigger again against the same target until TU advances. Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the extra turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

When this unit defeats an enemy with an attack, this unit gains Stealth and a Stealth Shield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: All Powerful?
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit has a 33% chance to:

- have its TU reduced to 0 after dealing damage with an Attack (1 chance per hit).
- each turn, survive any damage that would defeat it with 1HP.
- ignore the incoming status effects Sleep, Poison, and Burn.
- ignore incoming Stun effects.
- ignore attacks that would damage exactly 2 targets. Attacks that target All allies will not be ignored.
- enrage 1 random ally at the end of each turn.
- weaken 1 random enemy at the end of each turn.

The chance for each effect is determined independently each time they may occur. Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn. Weakened units have their Attack reduced to 0.75x until the end of their next turn. These effects will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on affected units. The effect of Weakening may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects and it can be overwritten by Enrage effects. Effects that influence TU order may interrupt the extra turn (e.g. Stuns targeting the lowest TU target).

passiveSkillDetails.name: Unlimited Healing
passiveSkillDetails.description:
Each time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will be Purified (any negative status effects like sleep, burn or poison are removed), and heal for 75% of its max HP.

Purifies and heals all allies on the battlefield for 800% of this unit's attack when another non-conjured ally on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. This may not trigger if this unit is defeated or sacrificed at the same time.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Unrelenting Defense

The first time this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will enter Enduring Stance for 150TU. While in Enduring Stance, this unit cannot be defeated by damage unless it is burning, and cannot be granted Poison, Sleep, or Stuns.
Once Enduring Stance ends, this unit will enter Recovery Stance for 150TU. While in Recovery Stance, this unit has 65% damage reduction from attacks, and heals for 40% of max HP at the end of each turn. Whenever this unit is at max HP after this healing triggers, it will be Purified and will Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP. Endure effects cannot stack. These stances can trigger once each time this unit is on the battlefield.

When this unit enters battle all enemies will be granted Rage Wards. Rage Wards will prevent a unit from becoming Enraged once, then be removed. Rage Wards cannot stack.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Soul Substitute

While there is an Imposter among enemies on the battlefield:
- This unit cannot be defeated by non-attack damage.
- If this unit would be defeated by an attack while it does not have Endure, this unit will be Purified and healed for 100% of max HP, and then an enemy Imposter will be sacrificed.

This unit enters battle with a Poison Ward, Sleep Ward, Stun Ward, and Endure. Each Ward prevents their named effect from being applied once, then is removed. Identical Wards cannot stack.

A unit with Endure will endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP. Endure effects cannot stack.

Whenever this unit defeats a non-conjured enemy with an attack, an Imposter is added to the next in line of enemy reinforcements.

Whenever an enemy Imposter on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source (including Soul Substitute), all non-Imposter enemies on the battlefield that are not sleeping will become Mega Poisoned for 200TU and will be stunned for 50TU.

activeSkills.name: Demolition Raid
activeSkills.description: Consumes a Power Charge for 600% damage to 2 enemies. This attack ignores enemy damage reduction effects. Usable only if the user has a Power Charge.

activeSkills.name: Aegis Overload
activeSkills.description:
300% damage to all enemies and heals all allies for 800% of the user's Attack. All allies will become Enraged and all enemies hit by this attack will become Weakened, this will overwrite any existing Weak or Enrage effects on those units. This attack ignores Skin passive skills and the Counter Stance status effect.

The user will also have their Power Barrier passive skill reactivated and gain a Power Charge. Usable only if the user's Power Barrier passive skill is deactivated and becomes locked for 100TU after use.

- Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn.
- Weakened units have their Attack reduced to 0.75x until the end of their next turn. The effect of Weakening may be diminished if the affected unit's Attack is increased by other effects and it can be overwritten by Enrage effects.
- Power Charges cannot stack and will be removed when the user leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Power Barrier
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This Barrier will be activated whenever this unit enters battle.

While this unit is on the battlefield and this Barrier is activated:
- Allies gain 35% damage reduction from attacks. This effect can stack with other damage reduction effects such as Armor, but will not stack with itself or other ally Barrier type skills.
- This unit cannot be defeated by non-attack damage.
- If this unit takes damage from an attack and survives until after the end of the turn, this unit will heal for 25% of max HP.
-If this unit would be defeated by an attack, this Barrier will be deactivated and this unit will be Purified and healed for 100% of max HP.

If this unit's Barrier is deactivated and it would be defeated by an enemy attack or a status effect while having more than 1 HP, it instead survives with 1 HP.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Adaptive Circuit
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit's attacks will not wake sleeping enemies.

Whenever another non-conjured ally enters the battlefield from reinforcements, 20%+ chance for one of the following effects determined by that unit's Element to trigger.

WATER: Grants 1 random non-sleeping enemy Sleep (Forced) for 200TU.
FIRE: Grants Burn to all enemies.
EARTH: Grants 1 random non-sleeping enemy Cursed Sleep for 200TU (blocked by Burn).
STORM: Stuns 1 random enemy for 150TU.
DARK: Mega Poisons 1 random non-sleeping enemy for 200TU.
LIGHT: Purifies all allies and heals them for 400% of this unit's Attack.

The chance of these effects triggering increases by 20% for each Awakening this unit has, up to 100% when fully awakened. Successfully applied Status Effects will overwrite existing status effects on affected units.

The chance of Hypnosis applying increases by 20% for each awakening the user has, up to 100% max when fully awakened.

Hypnosis is not a status effect and cannot be removed by Purify skills, but will be canceled if the user is defeated or leaves the battlefield. Mega Poison will overwrite other status effects on that enemy. Mega Poison deals 20 times the damage of normal Poison and cannot be overwritten by normal Poison or Super Poison.

This skill becomes locked for 100TU after use and cannot be used if an enemy is already Hypnotized. Hypnosis will fail against Boss units.

activeSkills.name: Stealth Zone
activeSkills.description:
Each ally with a Stealth Strike type active skill is healed for HP equal to 500% of the user's Attack, becomes Enraged, and gains Stealth with a Stealth Shield. Allies gain 3 Spirit for each other affected ally. Cannot be used if the user already has both Stealth and a Stealth Shield.

-Stealth Strike type active skills are any skills that are unlocked while their user has Stealth.
-Stealth Shields prevent the next other status effect a unit would gain while Stealthed from applying.
-Stealth will overwrite other status effects on affected units. Stealthed units ignore the next enemy attack that would damage more than 1 target. Any damage will remove stealth.
-Enraged units have their Attack increased to 1.5x until the end of their next turn. This will overwrite the effects of other Enrage skills on affected units.

This will overwrite the effects of other Quicken effects on those allies.

-Other effects that further reduce TU will have diminishing returns while this TU Cost reduction is in effect.
-Quicken effects will not further reduce this unit's TU costs.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Mikaela's Rescue
passiveSkillDetails.description:
The first time this unit would be defeated by an attack while on the battlefield, it will instead survive the turn on 1HP. Then if this unit has not used Survivor's Rush while on the battlefield and there are any other non-conjured allies on the battlefield, this unit will be sent away from the battlefield to be next in line of allied reinforcements. If there are no allied reinforcements to replace this unit, enough Kuromoris (up to 3) will be added to the ally team so that it can still return to reinforcements.

If this unit survives on 1HP in this way and has used Survivor's Rush while on the battlefield, it will instead heal to full HP, gain the Stealth status effect (this will overwrite other status effects on this unit), and will Endure the next damage that would defeat it with 1HP, Endure effects cannot stack.

This passive skill will be disabled if there is another ally "Dark Jeanne, Summertime Fallen Angel" on the battlefield or in ally reinforcements.

50% damage to 1 enemy. 300% damage instead every second time this skill is activated while on the battlefield. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect and the effects of Skin passive skills.

25% chance of reducing the user's active skill TU costs by 50% on its next turn. Effects that further reduce TU will have diminishing returns while this TU cost reduction is in effect.

Also grants the user the Burn status effect. This will overwrite other status effects on the user.

activeSkillDetails.name: Crimson Ward
activeSkillDetails.description: Burns 1 Ally and grants them either a Stun Ward if they are a Fire or Earth unit, a Sleep Ward if they are a Storm or Dark unit, or a Poison Ward if they are a Water or Light unit. Burn will overwrite other status effects on that ally. Wards will prevent their named effect from applying to that ally once, then be removed. Identical Wards cannot stack. This skill becomes locked for 50TU after use.

activeSkillDetails.name: Demon Hellfire
activeSkillDetails.description: 600% damage to 1 enemy, this attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect and the effects of skin passive skills. The user and the target are immediately granted the Burn status effect. This will overwrite other status effects on both units. Usable if the user's party has 6 or more Spirit.

activeSkillDetails.name: Stroke of Death
activeSkillDetails.description: 500% damage to 1 enemy and heals the user for 100% of max HP if damage is dealt. This attack ignores the Counter Stance Status Effect and the effects of Skin passive skills. Unlocked each time this unit gains the Burn status effect. This skill is locked again after each use or if the user leaves the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Fires of Rejuvenation
passiveSkillDetails.description: Each time an ally gets the turn while Burning, they will heal for 20% of their own max HP and then allies will gain 1 Spirit after that turn so long as this unit remains on the battlefield.

passiveSkillDetails.name: Demonic Focus
passiveSkillDetails.description:
This unit is not affected by stun effects.

This unit's Attack is increased to 1.5x while it has the Burn status effect. This effect does not stack with Enrage skills.

If this unit would be defeated while it has the Burn status effect, it instead survives with 1 HP, then burn is removed from this unit.

activeSkills.description:

Snow Black will start with full HP, will be treated as a new conjured unit, and is considered to have entered the battlefield upon transformation.

Locked for 300TU after the user has entered the battlefield, or until a non-conjured enemy on the battlefield is defeated or sacrificed by any source. -Sleep Ward prevents Sleep from being applied once, then is removed. Sleep Wards cannot stack.

When this unit defeats an enemy unit with an attack while it is not a Guardian, it will become a Guardian. While this unit is a Guardian, it cannot be defeated by non-attack damage. If this unit would be defeated by an attack while it is a Guardian, this unit will stop being a Guardian and be healed for 100% of max HP.

For any enemy attack that would hit 1 or 2 other allies while this unit is a Guardian, 1 of the hits is instead redirected to this unit. This unit will not redirect skills that don't deal damage.

This unit cannot become a Guardian from other skills.

If this unit gains the Stealth status effect, it will not be lost when ignoring attacks in this way.
